price: 69. Tokkel kaxxa girá urseeniih Nabii Ibraahim teetit qambisen, Yalli isi farmoyta çatak girâ luk yaabeh: giray Ibraahimil xabcaa kee nagaynan tik teetik inne iyye yalli, tokkel gira kaa macarrisinnaay adá kaa maabinna.
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
